template.subject: A Preceptor has provided feedback for your review
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
A Preceptor has completed an assessment on you, please proceed to the following link to review and provide feedback:
%URL%
As a refresher your username is %USERNAME%, and if you have any trouble remembering your password you can reset it by clicking the following link, and entering %EMAIL% as your e-mail address.
%ENTRADA_URL%/password_reset
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let us know.
Sincerely, The %APPLICATION_NAME% team
